publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5152 Elizabeth Smith: Congratulations to Calum Macintyre—That the Parliament warmly congratulates Calum Macintyre from Kinross High School who, at 16, has become the youngest person to climb to the summit of Ama Dablam, which is one of the most technically difficult mountains in the Himalayas, and pays tribute to him and all his colleagues in Team Ascent who, in the course of their mountaineering adventures, have raised money for cancer charities.

S3M-5152 Congratulations to Calum Macintyre (lodged on 6 November 2009) Joe FitzPatrick*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Bill Kidd*, Jackie Baillie*, Ted Brocklebank*, Jamie McGrigor*, Bill Aitken*, John Lamont*, Sandra White*, John Park*, Trish Godman*, David Whitton*, Nanette Milne*
S3M-5152 Congratulations to Calum Macintyre (lodged on 6 November 2009) Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Jackson Carlaw*, Mary Scanlon*, Dr Richard Simpson*, Margaret Mitchell*, Hugh Henry*
S3M-5152 Congratulations to Calum Macintyre (lodged on 6 November 2009) Gil Paterson*, Christina McKelvie*
S3M-5152 Congratulations to Calum Macintyre (lodged on 6 November 2009) Aileen Campbell*
